idea-plugin.name: YY Dev Tools
idea-plugin.description:
A plugin for improving GWT-related project development efficiency and simplifying some operations, such as code navigation.

Featuresï¼š
  • Methods of GWT rpcAsync class can directly navigate to corresponding methods of GWT controller, just like "Go To Implementation"
  • Methods of GWT controller can find corresponding async methods usages in all GWT rpcAsync classes, just like "Find Usages"
More features beyond GWT-related project may be developed in the future.
